
// AUTO-GENERATED by camel-package-maven-plugin - DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
= camel infra

List and Run external services for testing and prototyping


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel infra [options]
----


== Subcommands

[cols="2,5",options="header"]
|===
| Subcommand | Description
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-infra-get.adoc[get] | Displays running service(s) information
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-infra-list.adoc[list] | Displays available external services
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-infra-log.adoc[log] | Displays external service logs
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-infra-ps.adoc[ps] | Displays running services
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-infra-run.adoc[run] | Run an external service
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-infra-stop.adoc[stop] | Shuts down running external services
|===



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--json` | Output in JSON Format |  | boolean
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
